title: Miss Marple Investigates
description: Four of the short stories by Agatha Christie featuring Miss Marple, as read by Joan Hickson, of Miss Marple TV fame.In 2 cassettes, it contains "The Case of the Perfect Maid," "The Case of the Caretaker," "The Tape Measure Murder," and "Strange Jest."Librarian's note: this entry is for the collection "Miss Marple Investigates." Entries for the individual short stories and the remaining 16, as well as the 12 novels in the Miss Marple series can be found elsewhere on Goodreads.
author: Agatha Christie
